name: Pinheads Bowling VR
description: Pinheads Bowling VR is a fun new way to play the classic game of bowling, with animated pins and sideline attractions that create an altogether unique bowling experience!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windwos 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX970, AMD R9 290, or greater. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: HTC Vive Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
